verses.name: Psalms 141:5
verses.text: Let the righteous smite me; it shall be a kindness: and let him reprove me; it shall be an excellent oil, which shall not break my head: for yet my prayer also shall be in their calamities.

verses.name: Psalms 141:6
verses.text: When their judges are overthrown in stony places, they shall hear my words; for they are sweet.

verses.name: Psalms 141:7
verses.text: Our bones are scattered at the grave’s mouth, as when one cutteth and cleaveth wood upon the earth.

verses.name: Psalms 141:8
verses.text: But mine eyes are unto thee, O God the Lord: in thee is my trust; leave not my soul destitute.
